description: My place is close to My place is very close to everything Astoria has to offer plus its only a 30 minute right into the city. If you enjoy dinning out then you will love Astoria.. You’ll love my place because of The apartment is very cozy and you will feel right at home. . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: City without the City noise
review: The flat is very comfurtable and clean. And most beautiful than on the pictures ! The localisation is very practical because the subway is direct to Times Square. Samuel is a welcoming host. I recommend the flat if you want to enjoy NY !
